description:
Serving all of Mercer, Middlesex, Somerset and Hunterdon counties from our law office in Trenton, New Jersey, the attorneys at Davis & Brusca, LLC, are here to help you obtain justice in the wake of a senseless and preventable tragedy. To that end, we offer exceptional advocacy and support to individuals and families who suffered an injury or loss as the result of someone else's negligence or wrongdoing.

A staple of our community for more than 20 years, our law firm has helped hundreds of innocent accident victims secure the finances they need to support themselves and their families. Over the years, we have recovered millions of dollars on behalf of those we have served, earning our reputation as one of the top legal practices in the region for all types of personal injury and wrongful death claims.

Whether you or a loved one was the victim of nursing home abuse, or you were hurt in an accident caused by another person's negligence, you have rights, and you can count on our highly rated and award-winning trial attorneys to help you assert those rights in order to hold the responsible parties accountable for their actions.
Recognized for our impeccable professionalism and outstanding legal abilities, we hold an AV-Preeminent peer review rating* from Martindale-Hubbell, and each of our founding attorneys has been voted among the country's Top 100 Trial Lawyers by The National Trial Lawyers organization.

This means your case will be handled by a local attorney you can trust with your most sensitive legal matters, and we will always treat you and your family with the compassion and dignity you deserve.
To find out more about how Davis & Brusca, LLC, can best help you during your difficult and uncertain time, you can contact our law office to schedule a free evaluation of your claim, and you will not have to pay us a cent for our services unless we recover compensation on your behalf.

*AV®, AV Preeminent®, Martindale-Hubbell Distinguished and Martindale-Hubbell Notable are certification marks used under license in accordance with the Martindale-Hubbell certification procedures, standards and policies. Martindale-Hubbell® is the facilitator of a peer review rating process. Ratings reflect the anonymous opinions of members of the bar and the judiciary. Martindale-Hubbell® Peer Review RatingTM fall into two categories - legal ability and general ethical standards.
